page.title: 17What Harpenden Means to Me
page.content: I am ten years old and I live in Harpenden. There are a lot of good activites to choose from. One of my favourite things to do is to go for long walks and I am lucky because there is a field at the bottom of my garden. On Sunday you can go to Sunday School. I go to the Salvation Army but there are many more. I often go to the library. I've got a library card and I borrow lots of books. In the summer I go to a swimming club at the open air pool in Harpenden. I have been going for two years and I think my swimming has really improved. I use the play equipment in Rothamsted Park quite a lot and enjoy myself playing with my friends. I like the choice of activities at the Sports' Centre. Last year I tried Archery. Harpenden is a good place to live.
